/* Language: Erlang REPL Author: Sergey Ignatov Website: https://www.erlang.org Category: functional */ /** @type LanguageFn */ function erlangRepl(hljs) { const regex = hljs.regex; return { name: 'Erlang REPL', keywords: { built_in: 'spawn spawn_link self', keyword: 'after and andalso|10 band begin bnot bor bsl bsr bxor case catch cond div end fun if ' + 'let not of or orelse|10 query receive rem try when xor' }, contains: [ { className: 'meta.prompt', begin: '^[0-9]+> ', relevance: 10 }, hljs.COMMENT('%', '$'), { className: 'number', begin: '\\b(\\d+(_\\d+)*#[a-fA-F0-9]+(_[a-fA-F0-9]+)*|\\d+(_\\d+)*(\\.\\d+(_\\d+)*)?([eE][-+]?\\d+)?)', relevance: 0 }, hljs.APOS_STRING_MODE, hljs.QUOTE_STRING_MODE, { begin: regex.concat( /\?(::)?/, /([A-Z]\w*)/, // at least one identifier /((::)[A-Z]\w*)*/ // perhaps more ) }, { begin: '->' }, { begin: 'ok' }, { begin: '!' }, { begin: '(\\b[a-z\'][a-zA-Z0-9_\']*:[a-z\'][a-zA-Z0-9_\']*)|(\\b[a-z\'][a-zA-Z0-9_\']*)', relevance: 0 }, { begin: '[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_\']*', relevance: 0 } ] }; } export { erlangRepl as default };
